Articles.Content: Why does the world have to be more complex than my computer can handle?

Why does the world have to be more complex than my computer can handle?

Because your computer is part of the world. Is it not somewhat of an oxymoron/paradox to have a system within a system which is capable of exactly recreating the system in which it exists?

Is it not somewhat of an oxymoron/paradox to have a system within a system which is capable of exactly recreating the system in which it exists?

Makes me think about minecraft in minecraft (which is actually possible, but in 2D)

Why does the world have to be more complex than my computer can handle?

IKR.

My computer lags on ksp more than it does on yours tho.

i can ASSURE YOU OF THAT!

If your computer lags from the terrain, Delete your settings.cfg file, And then put this in it\'s place, It adds an extra level of detail called 'very low' which brings the ocean back to the way it was in 0.13. Did the trick for me.
